translation.en: -Joel. -Shh. No words, my love.
translation.ja: ジョエル？ 何も言わないで

translation.en: I'm sorry, babe, I'm just not really a "pound one out" kind of gal.
translation.ja: ごめんねササッとヤるだけは嫌なの

translation.en: I know, and that's great.
translation.ja: 分かってるよ

translation.en: You like romance and lavender candles
translation.ja: ロマンチックなのが好きで食事に関しては⸺

translation.en: and a massage with essential oils and a wonderful meal but not too heavy.
translation.ja: ロマンチックなのが好きで食事に関しては⸺ クド過ぎないもの

translation.en: You're making fun of me.
translation.ja: からかってるの？

translation.en: No. I'm only saying that sometimes, maybe even now,
translation.ja: 違うよ 言いたいのはたまには今とかさ

translation.en: -we might try... -Humping?
translation.ja: 試してみても… 腰振りを？

translation.en: Like that rescue dog did to that little girl at the Rite Aid?
translation.ja: 薬局で 救助犬が少女にヤッてたように？

translation.en: [woman] Jennifer Lawrence chopped off her hair again.
translation.ja: Ｊ(ジェニファー)･ローレンスがまた髪を切った

translation.en: Everybody hates it like that but she doesn't care.
translation.ja: 評判が悪くても気にしないの

translation.en: She's so bold. I wish I was bold.
translation.ja: すごく大胆よね私も大胆になりたい

translation.en: Am I bold? No, I'm not.
translation.ja: 私って大胆？ 違うわね

translation.en: I'm really upset about the new toaster oven.
translation.ja: トースターにはガッカリだ

translation.en: I'd like to be 20 percent bolder.
translation.ja: 今より20％大胆になりたいわ

translation.en: No, more, 80 percent. No, that's too much.
translation.ja: いいえ 80％…大胆すぎるか

translation.en: Look at all the slack in these knobs. You can't set an accurate temperature.
translation.ja: ツマミが緩んでて温度も正しく設定できない

translation.en: Yeah, I know, honey. Did you send them an e-mail?
translation.ja: 苦情メールは送った？

translation.en: No, I re-read it. It came across a little crazy.
translation.ja: そこまでしなくてもいいかなと

translation.en: Well...
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: I need a car.
translation.ja: 車 買って

translation.en: I can't live here anymore without a car. We're in the middle of freaking nowhere.
translation.ja: ここは超不便だし車なしじゃムリ

translation.en: -We're not buying you a car. -You don't need to buy me a car.
translation.ja: 買ってやれない ママに新車を買うの私はママの車を使う

translation.en: Buy Mom a new car, I'll take hers. Like a normal family.
translation.ja: ママに新車を買うの私はママの車を使う

translation.en: -I like the Range Rover. -Ah.
translation.ja: レンジローバーがいい

translation.en: You'd look good in that.
translation.ja: いいね　似合う

translation.en: Why don't you love Mom enough to buy her a Range Rover?
translation.ja: 愛してるなら買ったら？

translation.en: What? What is it? Are you all right?
translation.ja: おい どうした？大丈夫か？

translation.en: Yeah, I just have this, like, sharp... [groans]
translation.ja: ええ ものすごい痛みが…

translation.en: Here, sit down.
translation.ja: ほら座って

translation.en: Is Mom dying?
translation.ja: ママ 死ぬの？

translation.en: -Stop it. -I don't know, parents die.
translation.ja: やめろ だって死にそう

translation.en: I'm not dying, honey. I probably just ate something.
translation.ja: 死なないわよたぶん変な物を食べただけ

translation.en: [sharp breath] I'm fine. See? All better.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 ね？　平気よ

translation.en: -Are you sure? You scared me. -Yeah, me too.
translation.ja: ビックリしたぞ 私も

translation.en: Makes you think... life is short.
translation.ja: 考えちゃった　人生短いって

translation.en: You're not getting a car.
translation.ja: 車は買わない

translation.en: Maybe we can hang out after school. Go to the Tea Garden together.
translation.ja: 放課後 一緒にお茶しない？

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: なんで？

translation.en: Because I love you and I don't see you very much.
translation.ja: だって 愛してるし久しぶりでしょ

translation.en: -I think this is working. -[car trunk opens]
translation.ja: 分かった　行くわ

translation.en: -Joel. -Dan.
translation.ja: ジョエル ダン

translation.en: Noticed a light on in your den all night.
translation.ja: 明かりが一晩中ついてたな

translation.en: Oh, okay. Someone's gonna get in trouble. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ああ そうか？誰か問題でも起こしたかな

translation.en: Just kidding, no one's in trouble.
translation.ja: 冗談だ　問題なし

translation.en: -Unusual, that's all. -Dan.
translation.ja: 怪しいな ダン

translation.en: -I had trouble sleeping, so I was up. -You had trouble sleeping?
translation.ja: 眠れなかったの 一晩中かい？

translation.en: -Problem? -Dan, leave people alone.
translation.ja: それは… ダン もうやめて

translation.en: -Cop brain, sorry. -I'm not a cop, baby.
translation.ja: 警官って嫌ね 保安官だロサンゼルス郡保安局一筋

translation.en: -LA Sheriff's Department, all the way. -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: 保安官だロサンゼルス郡保安局一筋

translation.en: Dickless over there is a cop. Morning, puss.
translation.ja: 警官は あの玉なしよう 子猫ちゃん

translation.en: Another day in pretend law enforcement?
translation.ja: お飾りの警察へ出勤か？

translation.en: Have a good day, Dan. Be safe.
translation.ja: いい１日を　無事を祈る

translation.en: Santa Monica PD. Shitbirds. [scoffs]
translation.ja: サンタモニカ署 くだらねえ

translation.en: Be careful today chasing bad guys, honey bunch.
translation.ja: 悪人の追跡には用心しろ

translation.en: Oh, that's right, they don't allow pursuits in Santa Monica. Worried it might hurt somebody's feelings.
translation.ja: おっと 追跡禁止だったな気分を害されるからって

translation.en: -Just trying not to kill civilians, Dan. -[baby coos]
translation.ja: 民間人を殺さないようにな ダン

translation.en: We protect and serve, not frame and maim like the sheriff's department.
translation.ja: 俺らは保安局と違い市民を保護してる

translation.en: -Suck me, Rick. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: クソッタレ！

translation.en: Joel, Sheila.
translation.ja: じゃあ お先に

translation.en: Why do we gotta live between two cops? Why couldn't it be two rival pastry chefs?
translation.ja: なぜ両隣が警官なんだ？パティシエがよかった

translation.en: -I don't know. -See you at the Petersons'.
translation.ja: そうね ピーターソンの家でね

translation.en: Do you have everything you need?
translation.ja: 忘れ物は？

translation.en: -[Abby] Yes, Mom. -I'm just checking.
translation.ja: ないってば 確認よ

translation.en: -Bye, Dad. -Bye, honey.
translation.ja: バーイ

translation.en: Abby. -You look so pretty today. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: アビー今日は すごくキレイね

translation.en: Eric worships you. You're the queen of his spank bank.
translation.ja: 息子があなたを想像してオナニーを

translation.en: Mom, please!
translation.ja: ママ やめてよ！

translation.en: [Abby] Okay.
translation.ja: そっか…

translation.en: Hey, some of us girls are going out tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜 女子会があって⸺

translation.en: Drinking, dancing, etcetera. You wanna come?
translation.ja: 飲んだり踊ったりするけど？

translation.en: No, I can't, um, tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜は ムリなのでも ありがとう

translation.en: -But thank you. -You're so flustered.
translation.ja: 今夜は ムリなのでも ありがとう 男遊びはしないって旦那には言ってる

translation.en: We're not banging dudes. At least that's what we tell our husbands.
translation.ja: 男遊びはしないって旦那には言ってる

translation.en: You're funny. Have a nice day.
translation.ja: 面白い人ね　いい１日を

translation.en: Sheila Hammond, say hello to Gary West.
translation.ja: シーラゲイリーを紹介しよう

translation.en: Gary was rocking it up in Sacramento. Now he's all ours.
translation.ja: 他社で活躍してたが我らの一員に

translation.en: -Hi, Gary. Uh, welcome aboard. -Thank you, Sheila.
translation.ja: ようこそ ゲイリー

translation.en: I'm very excited to be here.
translation.ja: どうも 来れて嬉(うれ)しいよ

translation.en: Sheila works with her husband. She's the pretty one.
translation.ja: 彼女は旦那と組んでる美人だろ

translation.en: You two gonna sell the Peterson house today?
translation.ja: ピーターソン家を売るんだろ？

translation.en: We're gonna try, Carl.
translation.ja: 頑張ります

translation.en: None of this "try" bullshit. Do it!
translation.ja: そんな たわ言はやめろ売るんだ！

translation.en: Oh, you're yelling at me.
translation.ja: 怒鳴るんですね

translation.en: The Petersons are nervous. We cannot lose this goddamn listing.
translation.ja: 売主がヤキモキしてる早くまとめるんだ

translation.en: Well, this is the third time these buyers have been at the house.
translation.ja: 今日で内覧は３度目です

translation.en: -Get an offer! -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: 契約させろ！

translation.en: Get an offer.
translation.ja: 家を売れ

translation.en: -That's what realtors do. -Okay.
translation.ja: それが仕事だろ そのとおり

translation.en: Come on, I'll show you your office. It's small.
translation.ja: オフィスへ案内しよう小さいが

translation.en: It's nice meeting you. I'm so sorry you got yelled at.
translation.ja: 会えてよかった怒鳴られてお気の毒に

translation.en: Same. I mean, nice meeting you, not sorry I got yelled at.
translation.ja: 私もよつまり 会えてよかった 怒鳴られたことじゃなくて

translation.en: -Well, actually both. -[laughs]
translation.ja: 怒鳴られたことじゃなくて

translation.en: The master has been completely remodeled.
translation.ja: 主寝室は全面的に改装されて 日当たりも抜群

translation.en: Lots of light and brand-new textured plush carpeting.
translation.ja: 主寝室は全面的に改装されて 日当たりも抜群 最新素材のカーペットも

translation.en: -All headed in the same direction. -[all chuckle]
translation.ja: 織り目も均一です

translation.en: It's just lovely.
translation.ja: ステキね

translation.en: Do you know what my favorite thing about the upstairs is?
translation.ja: ２階の私のお気に入りはランドリーシュートよ

translation.en: -The laundry chute. -Oh, it's amazing.
translation.ja: ２階の私のお気に入りはランドリーシュートよ 最高ね

translation.en: It was so--
translation.ja: あれはまさに…

translation.en: -[muffled gasp] -Oh, my God.
translation.ja: 何てこと

translation.en: [Joel] Honey, you okay?
translation.ja: ハニー 大丈夫か？

translation.en: I'm sorry. We are gonna call a crew and immediately get that cleaned up.
translation.ja: すみません すぐ清掃員を呼んでクリーニングさせます

translation.en: Maybe we should reschedule.
translation.ja: また日を改めよう

translation.en: Great idea. I could run you up to that Cape Cod on Barnhill.
translation.ja: それがいいわ では バーンヒルの物件に

translation.en: No, please. I don't wanna make everyone have to come back.
translation.ja: 待って またお越し頂くのは申し訳ないわ

translation.en: I'm just gonna go use the restroom really quickly, and call the cleaning crew.
translation.ja: トイレを使わせてもらってその後 清掃員を

translation.en: I'll be right back, excuse me.
translation.ja: すぐに戻ります　失礼

translation.en: -Okay, other bedrooms. -Yes, this way.
translation.ja: 別の寝室へ こちらです

translation.en: New skylights really open it up, don't you think?
translation.ja: 新しい天窓が開放的でしょう？

translation.en: -I love the crown molding in here. -Mmm.
translation.ja: 廻縁(まわりぶち)が見事ですよね

translation.en: -Just beautiful. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 実に美しい

translation.en: I wanna leave.
translation.ja: 帰りたい

translation.en: Sheila.
translation.ja: シーラ？

translation.en: -[knocking] -Sheila-- Oh, my God.
translation.ja: 何だよ これ

translation.en: Oh, my God, Sheila.
translation.ja: どうなってるんだ シーラ

translation.en: Sheila. Sheila? Sheila.
translation.ja: シーラ　シーラ！

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.ja: ウソだろ？

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.ja: マジかよ

translation.en: Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God.
translation.ja: どうしてだよ　なんでだ

translation.en: Oh! Sheila.
translation.ja: シーラ

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
translation.ja: ダメだ 死んじゃダメだよ

translation.en: -Did we get the offer? -[gasps] Oh, what the fuck?
translation.ja: 家は売れた？ 何なんだよ！

translation.en: I'm okay. I just threw up.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　吐いただけよ

translation.en: Like a fair amount.
translation.ja: かなり大量にね

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そうだな

translation.en: And that came out of me.
translation.ja: これも吐いたのよね

translation.en: Do you think it's an organ?
translation.ja: 臓器だと思う？

translation.en: I really am feeling better, honey.
translation.ja: よくなってきたわ

translation.en: I wanna get you looked at.
translation.ja: 検査してほしい

translation.en: [sighs] We've been here over three hours. I just wanna go home, get out of these clothes and take a bath.
translation.ja: ３時間も待ってるのよ帰ってお風呂に入りたい

translation.en: I feel like a bus station shit in my mouth.
translation.ja: 口の中がバス停のウンコの味なの

translation.en: [pats his thigh] I'll go see what's happening.
translation.ja: 聞いてくるよ

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: Do not ask me again how long it's gonna be. This isn't a deli counter.
translation.ja: 待ち時間なんて聞かないで飲食店じゃないのよ

translation.en: The most life-threatening conditions have priority. Your wife threw up.
translation.ja: 命に関わる方が優先よ奥さんは吐いただけ

translation.en: -A lot. -Your wife threw up.
translation.ja: 大量に 吐いただけ

translation.en: -A lot. -Okay, we're not doing this.
translation.ja: めいっぱい この話はおしまい

translation.en: Gonna call your doctor and make you some soup. You lost a lot of fluids.
translation.ja: 医者を呼んでからスープを作るよ

translation.en: I'm okay with you smoking pot.
translation.ja: マリファナならＯＫよ

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: I know I complain about it so you try to hide it,
translation.ja: 文句言ったから隠れて吸ってる

translation.en: but I just want you to be the Joel you want to be.
translation.ja: 文句言ったから隠れて吸ってる でも ありのままでいて

translation.en: -That's... -[vehicle approaching] -That's really nice, sweetheart. -[door opens]
translation.ja: それ すごく嬉しいよ

translation.en: -Sheila. -Gary.
translation.ja: シーラ ゲイリー

translation.en: This is Gary, the new realtor I was telling you about.
translation.ja: ウチに入ったって話したわね

translation.en: Gary, my husband, Joel.
translation.ja: 夫のジョエルよ

translation.en: -Hey, Gary. -Hi there.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: So how are you feeling? I heard about your afternoon.
translation.ja: 具合はどう？　大変だったね

translation.en: -Much better, thank you. -Oh, these are for you.
translation.ja: よくなったわ これを君に

translation.en: And I made sure the cleaning crew got in there okay. They took care of everything so don't worry about that.
translation.ja: 清掃員には確認済みだ後始末は心配しないで

translation.en: -Thank you, Gary. That is so sweet. -So sweet.
translation.ja: ありがとうすごく優しいのね お優しい

translation.en: Well, we'd invite you in, but--
translation.ja: 家に上がってもらいたいが…

translation.en: Don't even think about it. But listen-- Joel, can I talk to you a moment?
translation.ja: それより ジョエル話せる？

translation.en: I'm gonna go get cleaned up.
translation.ja: シャワー浴びてくるわ

translation.en: Thanks for the flowers, Gar, and all your help.
translation.ja: お花とヘルプをありがとう

translation.en: No problem.
translation.ja: どういたしまして

translation.en: Feel better.
translation.ja: お大事に

translation.en: That was a crazy amount of vomit.
translation.ja: ゲロの量は異常だ

translation.en: Well, I'm not a medical expert, so I can't say what the proper amount of vomit is.
translation.ja: 専門家じゃないし普通の量は知らないね

translation.en: -It was a huge amount. -Are you a doctor, Gary?
translation.ja: とんでもない量だ 君は医者か？

translation.en: -No. -Neither am I.
translation.ja: 違う 俺も違う

translation.en: So let's not dishonor that profession,
translation.ja: 医者の権威を汚すのはよそう

translation.en: which takes eight years of intense training, by thinking we can give medical opinions, okay?
translation.ja: ８年も厳しい訓練を受けてやっとなれるんだ

translation.en: Fine, then let's just stick to facts.
translation.ja: では事実を伝えよう

translation.en: The homeowners came by, they didn't like what they saw.
translation.ja: 売主が気分を害した

translation.en: So they don't want to work with you anymore. They'll be working with me now.
translation.ja: 今後 君たちではなく僕が担当する

translation.en: You're stealing our listing?
translation.ja: 顧客を盗(と)った？

translation.en: No, the facts are they fired you, then hired me.
translation.ja: 君たちはクビにされ僕が雇われたんだ

translation.en: And that was an insane amount of vomit.
translation.ja: やっぱり ゲロの量は異常だ

translation.en: Everything's good. Gary just needed some advice. I helped him out.
translation.ja: アドバイスが必要で助けてやったよ

translation.en: I can't feel my heartbeat.
translation.ja: 心臓の鼓動を感じないの

translation.en: -What? -My heart.
translation.ja: 何？ 鼓動よ

translation.en: I can't feel it.
translation.ja: 感じないの

translation.en: [sighs] I love your hair.
translation.ja: あなたの髪 大好き

translation.en: Yeah. Like that.
translation.ja: そう いいわ

translation.en: Bingo. [exhales]
translation.ja: ビンゴ

translation.en: -Can I help you? -What?
translation.ja: お困りですか？

translation.en: My manager noticed that you've been staring at the stethoscopes for, like, a really long time.
translation.ja: 聴診器を長い間見てる人がいると店長に言われて

translation.en: There's something happening with my wife.
translation.ja: 妻の身に何かが起きてるんだ

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm only 20, so...
translation.ja: あの まだハタチなんでその…

translation.en: Right. Sorry.
translation.ja: そうか　悪かったね

translation.en: Do you know the difference between the dual-headed stethoscopes and the single-headed ones?
translation.ja: ダブルタイプとシングルの違いは？

translation.en: Well, dual would be two.
translation.ja: そうですねダブルは２つです

translation.en: I see. So twice as many then.
translation.ja: じゃあ ２倍ってことか

translation.en: It's not just a physical thing, she's acting different.
translation.ja: 身体的な事だけじゃなく様子も違う

translation.en: I'm gonna get this one.
translation.ja: これ もらうよ

translation.en: It doesn't make sense.
translation.ja: なぜ音がしないんだ

translation.en: My jaw still kinda hurts.
translation.ja: まだアゴが痛いんだ

translation.en: Then stop talking.
translation.ja: じゃあ 黙って

translation.en: I don't hear anything.
translation.ja: 何も聞こえない

translation.en: -[Joel] I know, right? -There's something else.
translation.ja: そうだろ？ ほかにも

translation.en: But no one freak out because I feel fine.
translation.ja: パニくらないでね私は平気だから

translation.en: Look. No blood.
translation.ja: 見て　血も出ないの

translation.en: Still, no one freak out.
translation.ja: まだよ　落ち着いて

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.ja: あらやだ

translation.en: -[Sheila] Is the juice helping? -Uh-huh.
translation.ja: 落ち着いた？

translation.en: Yep.
translation.ja: うん

translation.en: [Joel] I can cook that meat for you, sweetheart.
translation.ja: それで何か作るよ

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.ja: 平気よ

translation.en: -We should go back to the emergency room. -No.
translation.ja: 救急外来に戻ろう 嫌よ

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: Look, I know things are very wrong but I feel good.
translation.ja: 変なのは承知よでも 気分はいいの

translation.en: I have all this energy and, like, a focus.
translation.ja: エネルギーいっぱいって感じ

translation.en: I can't go to a hospital where they're gonna put me in a tube and prick me and poke me.
translation.ja: 病院に戻ったら実験台にされて⸺

translation.en: They might never let me come home again.
translation.ja: 二度と家に帰れないかも

translation.en: Bad for you because we're having spectacular sex.
translation.ja: そしたら 最高のアレができなくなるわよ

translation.en: Ew!
translation.ja: キモイ

translation.en: Whatever this is, we need to talk to someone because we are not experts.
translation.ja: 何が起きてるか分からないが誰かに相談しよう

translation.en: And this is just the sort of thing the Internet will have a lot of misinformation about.
translation.ja: ネットじゃ誤った情報だらけだろうし

translation.en: -[Abby] I know someone. -Who?
translation.ja: １人いるよ 誰だ？

translation.en: -A creeper. -What's a creeper?
translation.ja: 不気味くん どんな子？

translation.en: The kind of a nerd who specializes in disturbing, weird or gruesome shit.
translation.ja: 異常なことや キモイことに詳しいオタク

translation.en: No pupillary response.
translation.ja: 瞳孔反射はないな

translation.en: Have you noticed any deteriorating flesh?
translation.ja: 皮膚の衰えは？

translation.en: -No? -Blackening of the skin,
translation.ja: 例えば？ 黒ずみとか 剥がれたりは？

translation.en: digits or other pieces falling off?
translation.ja: 黒ずみとか 剥がれたりは？

translation.en: -No. -Okay.
translation.ja: してない

translation.en: -Um, have you eaten anyone? -No.
translation.ja: 人を食べたことは？ ないわよ

translation.en: -But I may have thrown up an organ. -No worries.
translation.ja: でも 臓器を吐き出したかも 気にしないで
